zh.title: 全国产智能体MasterAgent：一句话造专属AI团队，专业协同交付
zh.summary: 中科大团队研发全球首个L4级智能体母体系统MasterAgent，实现多智能体极速生成与协作，1分钟内可创建专业团队完成复杂任务，已在法律、金融等领域落地应用。

zh.title: 8点1氪｜英伟达因H20芯片漏洞后门被约谈；8月起现金买黄金超10万需上报；微软成史上第二家市值破4万亿美元公司
zh.summary: 国家网信办约谈英伟达公司，要求其就H20芯片安全风险问题提交说明材料，英伟达回应称芯片不存在后门。

zh.title: 让机器人拥有智能触觉，「悟通感控」获数千万元融资 | 36氪独家
zh.summary: 柔性触觉感知科技公司「悟通感控」完成数千万元Pre-A系列融资，其离电式薄膜触觉传感技术突破行业"不可能三角"，实现量产并应用于医疗、新能源等领域，获多家头部企业合作。

zh.title: 奔驰大电池新车，计划采用吉利插混技术｜36氪独家
zh.summary: 奔驰拟与吉利合作开发超长续航插混系统，加速本土化布局以应对中国市场激烈竞争，双方正就技术细节进行协商。

zh.title: 氪星晚报｜转转集团与迪拜机场自贸区签署合作备忘录；亚马逊停止在谷歌旗下电商平台Google Shopping投放广告；Arm CEO：公司正在自研芯片
zh.summary: 一加手机2025年上半年销量同比增31%，增幅居行业首位，下半年将首发搭载升级版自研"风驰游戏内核"技术。

zh.title: 李斌“剧透”蔚来第三代 ES8 本月举行技术发布会，下月上市
zh.summary: 蔚来宣布第三代ES8将于本月举行技术发布会，9月NIO Day 2025正式上市，新车搭载900V超充快换平台及旗舰级双电机系统，支持5分钟快充250公里。

zh.title: Canalys 报告 2025Q2 全球手机出货量：三星同比增 7%、苹果降 2%、小米持平、vivo 增 2%、传音降 3%
zh.summary: 2025年Q2全球智能手机出货量2.889亿台同比持平，三星以20%份额领跑市场，出货量增长7%至5750万台，苹果、小米分列二三位。

zh.title: 特斯拉中国 V4 超级充电桩新增福建、广东等 7 省 15 站投入使用
zh.summary: 特斯拉V4超充桩新增7省15站投入运营，覆盖福建、广东等地，支持非特斯拉车辆充电并具备防雨防水功能。

zh.title: 腾讯客服回应微信提现手续费下降：最低下限改为 0.01 元，7 月 25 日全量更新
zh.summary: 微信支付调整提现手续费规则，7月25日起单笔服务费最低收取标准从0.1元降至0.01元，超额提现仍按0.1%收费，用户可通过积分兑换免费提现券。

zh.title: 魅族 22 手机开启 0 元新品预约：打造 1.22mm 全球极窄四等白边框，ChinaJoy 猜真机模样
zh.summary: 魅族22手机开启全平台预约，主打1.22mm全球极窄边框设计，并在ChinaJoy 2025展会上通过四款机模盲猜活动预热新品。

zh.title: 蔚来翻身之战！18万开走大三排SUV，市值一夜大涨58亿
zh.summary: 蔚来发布18万起售大空间SUV引爆市场，股价单日飙升58亿元，线上线下销售渠道均现火爆抢购场面。

zh.title: WAIC 2025现场直击：看云深处科技如何将具身智能转化为实际生产力
zh.summary: 云深处科技在WAIC 2025展示具身智能新突破，通过"连续作业+系统协同"模式推动智能技术规模化应用落地。

zh.title: Robotaxi营收同比增长836.7%，季度营收同比增长60.8% | 文远知行发布Q2财报
zh.summary: 文远知行Q2财报显示，Robotaxi业务营收同比激增836.7%，带动公司总营收达1.27亿元，同比增长60.8%。

zh.title: 智慧医院“中国方案”走向全球
zh.summary: 商汤医疗在2025世界人工智能大会上展示智慧医院"中国方案"，推动全球医疗智能化发展。

zh.title: 机器人终于能帮人洗衣服了
zh.summary: 科学家研发新型家务机器人，首次实现自主完成衣物分类、洗涤、晾晒全流程，标志着家庭服务机器人技术取得重大突破。

zh.title: Manus大升级，100多个智能体并发给你做任务
zh.summary: AI公司Manus推出重大升级，支持100多个智能体并发处理任务，大幅提升工作效率。

zh.title: 挖人上瘾的Meta又被员工吐嘈：不帮忙宣传项目，开源只会越来越糟
zh.summary: Meta因过度挖角遭员工批评，被指忽视项目宣传导致开源生态恶化。

zh.title: 机器人不只会抓和放！北京大学X银河通用「世界-动作模型」赋能全面泛化的非抓握技能
zh.summary: 北大与银河通用联合研发"世界-动作模型"，突破机器人仅能抓取局限，实现复杂非抓握动作的泛化操作能力。

zh.title: ACL'25最佳论文独家解读：大模型有「抗改造」基因，现有后训练范式失灵预警
zh.summary: 大模型后训练研究揭示"抗改造"特性，现有优化方法面临失效风险，引发学界对模型可塑性的重新审视。

zh.title: 当提示词优化器学会进化，竟能胜过强化学习
zh.summary: AI提示词优化器通过自我进化超越传统强化学习，展现更强性能。

en.title: Apple shipped its 3 billionth iPhone
en.summary: Apple CEO Tim Cook announced the company has sold 3 billion iPhones despite recent criticism over AI strategy and design choices.

en.title: Apple says Trump’s tariffs are adding another $1 billion to its costs
en.summary: 苹果因特朗普关税政策损失惨重，CEO库克称9月季度成本或增加11亿美元，6月季度已支出8亿美元。

en.title: Tim Cook says Apple is ‘open to’ AI acquisitions
en.summary: Apple CEO Tim Cook announces increased AI investments and openness to mergers during Q3 earnings call, as company reports $94 billion revenue, up 10% year-over-year.

en.title: Google’s Pixel Tablet is $190 off for a limited time
en.summary: Google Pixel Tablet (256GB) returns to $309 deal at Best Buy after brief Prime Day sellout, though with slightly different discount terms.

en.title: Reddit wants to be a search engine now
en.summary: Reddit CEO Steve Huffman announced plans to enhance the platform's search capabilities while leveraging its valuable user data, following recent AI licensing deals with OpenAI and Google.

en.title: Developer survey shows trust in AI coding tools is falling as usage rises
en.summary: 开发者调查显示，随着AI编程工具使用率上升，开发者对其信任度反而下降，因"接近正确但不完全准确"的AI方案导致更多调试工作。

en.title: Man had a cross tattooed on his neck—it vanished, then his flesh started dying
en.summary: 男子颈部十字架纹身神秘消失后皮肤坏死，需手术切除病灶并重建颈部组织。

en.title: Microsoft catches Russian hackers targeting foreign embassies
en.summary: 微软发现俄罗斯黑客攻击外国使馆，意图植入恶意TLS根证书以窃取情报。

en.title: YouTube’s selfie collection, AI age checks are concerning, privacy experts say
en.summary: YouTube's new AI-powered age verification system requiring selfies or ID uploads raises privacy concerns, as users mistakenly flagged as minors must submit sensitive personal data.

en.title: Google loses app store antitrust appeal, must make sweeping changes to Play Store
en.summary: 谷歌上诉失败，将被迫对Play商店进行重大调整，此举可能打破安卓应用市场垄断格局。

en.title: The Download: OpenAI’s future research, and US climate regulation is under threat
en.summary: OpenAI's research direction is now being shaped by two key figures, signaling a shift from its previous CEO-centric leadership style.

en.title: The two people shaping the future of OpenAI’s research
en.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman's celebrity status overshadows company's other leaders despite recent leadership turmoil.

en.title: The AI Hype Index: The White House’s war on “woke AI”
en.summary: "New AI Hype Index launched to cut through industry noise, as Trump administration targets 'woke AI' with new executive order."

en.title: An EPA rule change threatens to gut US climate regulations
en.summary: "US climate regulation faces critical threat as EPA's authority comes under scrutiny, part of broader challenges to America's science leadership."

en.title: Roundtables: Why It’s So Hard to Make Welfare AI Fair
en.summary: Amsterdam's welfare algorithm experiment failed to eliminate bias, raising questions about whether fair AI decision-making is possible, as experts debate the challenges of algorithmic fairness in social systems.

en.title: Female-founded semiconductor AI startup SixSense raises $8.5M
en.summary: AI startup SixSense secures funding from Peak XV's Surge to enhance chip manufacturing defect prevention with its AI platform.

en.title: Amazon CEO wants to put ads in your Alexa+ conversations
en.summary: 亚马逊CEO安迪·贾西展示Alexa+的AI广告新功能，通过多轮对话推荐商品，为科技行业开辟全新商业模式。

en.title: Apple projects tariff costs will hit $1.1B next quarter
en.summary: 苹果CEO库克淡化关税担忧对销量的影响，强调产品实力才是消费者购买的主要动力。

en.title: Reddit revenue soars as it bets on AI and advertising
en.summary: Reddit's Q2 earnings surge driven by strategic AI investments and advertising growth.

en.title: Apple has now sold 3 billion iPhones
en.summary: iPhone sales growth accelerates, but analysts caution the surge may be temporary.
